description: go.crypto/ssh: seed random generator, so auto port allocation is truly random.

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=96563f6f87f6&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto/ssh: seed random generator, so auto port allocation is truly random.

R=agl, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12027043

Committer: Adam Langley <agl@golang.org>
I though about making this randomness stronger, but it's only for a workaround of a buggy sshd, so I think keeping it simple is preferable.
